text: Rookie, your first task is to collect a debt from the local inhabitants. They're not used to civilized methods, so get ready for... unconventional negotiations.
Finally! I'm sure I can find common ground with them. Maybe offer an installment plan or alternative payment method?
Your enthusiasm is touching, but illusions are deadly here. These creatures won't listen to your pleas about 'goodwill'a. It's time to understand how things really work in this world.
